thread.title: Pope to visit Kenya, Uganda, CAR in Nov on first Africa trip
thread.title_full: Pope to visit Kenya, Uganda, CAR in Nov on first Africa trip | News24

author: news24.com
title: Pope to visit Kenya, Uganda, CAR in Nov on first Africa trip
text:
Vatican City (dpa) - Pope Francis will visit Kenya, Uganda and the Central African Republic in late November, the Vatican said on Thursday.
Francis will be in Kenya November 25-27, in Uganda November 27-29 and in Central African Republic November 29-30.
It will be the Argentine pontiff's first visit to Africa, and the 11th foreign trip of his pontificate.
Francis has so far travelled to Brazil; Jordan, Israel and the Palestinian territories; South Korea; Albania; the European Parliament in Strasbourg, France; Turkey; Sri Lanka and the Philippines; Bosnia; Ecuador, Bolivia and Paraguay.
